newsitem.title: GUATEMALA: Guatemala's Dec coffee exports 443,155 60-kg bags.
newsitem.headline: Guatemala's Dec coffee exports 443,155 60-kg bags.

text.p: Guatemala exported 443,155 60-kg bags of coffee in December, the National Coffee Association (Anacafe) said Friday.
The 43-percent increase over December 1995 exports of 310,546 bags was due to favorable prices, not to a larger harvest, Anacafe president Julio Arrivillaga told Reuters.
"The short-term positions look attractive, so everyone has sold all they could. It does not reflect that there will be a larger harvest," said Arrivillaga.
December exports were 12 percent higher than November, when 396,423 60-kg bags of coffee were exported.
Arrivillaga said the total 1996 harvest was 973,529 60-kg bags through the last week of December.

Anacafe has not revised its late November prediction for the 1996-1997 harvest, which is 3.45 to 3.6 million 60-kg bags, said Arrivillaga. Guatemala exported 3.7 million 60-kg bags of coffee from the 1995-1996 harvest.
